title: BroadcastEvent
description: An over the air or online broadcast event.

isLiveBroadcast.description: True if the broadcast is of a live event.

broadcastOfEvent.description: The event being broadcast such as a sporting event or awards ceremony.

subtitleLanguage.description: Languages in which subtitles/captions are available, in [IETF BCP 47 standard format](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47).

videoFormat.description: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).
